name: Anub'arak
title: Traitor King
description: A Tank who specializes agaist Mages thanks in part to his innate Spell Armor.

primary.name: Harden Carapace
primary.description: Gain a Shield that absorbs 327.6 (+4% per level) damage over 3 seconds.

primary.name: Burrow Charge
primary.description:
Burrow to the target location, dealing 99.84 damage and briefly stunning enemies in a small area upon surfacing, slowing them by 25% for 2.5 seconds.

Burrow Charge can be reactivated to surface early.

primary.name: Locust Swarm
primary.description: Deal 62.4 damage per second to nearby enemies. Each enemy damaged restores 17.68 Health. Lasts 8 seconds.

primary.name: Cocoon
primary.description: Wraps target enemy Hero in a cocoon, rendering them unable to act or be targeted for 8 seconds. Allies of the Hero can attack the cocoon to break it and free them early.

primary.name: Scarab Host
primary.description: Using a Basic Ability spawns a Beetle which lasts for 8 seconds, attacking nearby enemies for 20.8 damage.

1.name: Nerubian Armor
1.description: Every 8 seconds, gain 30 Spell Armor against the next enemy Ability and subsequent Abilities for 1.5 seconds, reducing the damage taken by 30%.

1.name: Regenation Master
1.questDescription: Gathering a Regeneration Globe increases your Health Regeneration by 1 per second, up to 30.
1.rewardDescription: After gathering 30 Regeneration Globes, you also gain 500 Health.

4.name: Bed of Barbs
4.description: Create a bed of spikes along Impale's path that slows enemies by 30% and deals 23.92 damage per second. Spikes persist for 3.5 seconds.

4.name: Shed Exoskeleton
4.description: Harden Carapace grants 30% increased Movement Speed for 3 seconds.

4.name: Underking
4.description: Increases Burrow Charge range by 20% and damage by 100%.

4.name: Legion of Beetles
4.description: Automatically spawn a Beetle every 8 seconds. Can be toggled on and off.

7.name: Chitinous Plating
7.description: While Harden Carapace is active, taking damage from enemy Abilities reduces its cooldown by 0.75 seconds, up to 3 seconds.

7.name: Subterranean Shield
7.description: Burrow Charge also grants a 379.6 point shield for 5 seconds.

7.name: Leeching Scarabs
7.description: Beetles gain 20% bonus attack damage and they heal Anub'arak for 50% of their damage with each attack if he is nearby.

10.name: Locust Swarm
10.description: Deal 62.4 damage per second to nearby enemies. Each enemy damaged restores 17.68 Health. Lasts 8 seconds.

10.name: Cocoon
10.description: Wraps target enemy Hero in a cocoon, rendering them unable to act or be targeted for 8 seconds. Allies of the Hero can attack the cocoon to break it and free them early.

13.name: Burning Rage
13.description: Deal 23.92 damage per second to nearby enemies.

13.name: Urticating Spines
13.description: Casting Harden Carapace will also deal 83.2 damage to nearby enemies. Deals double damage against Heroes.

13.name: Acid Drenched Mandibles
13.description: Attacking a Hero that is slowed, rooted, or stunned increases Anub'arak's Basic Attack damage by 70% for 3 seconds.

16.name: Epicenter
16.description: Increases Burrow Charge impact area by 85% and lowers the cooldown by 2 seconds for each Hero hit.

16.name: Debilitation
16.description: Enemy Heroes hit by Burrow Charge have their Spell Power reduced by 50% for 4 seconds.

16.name: Beetle, Juiced
16.description: Every 3rd Basic Attack against enemy Heroes spawns a Beetle.

20.name: Hive Master
20.description: Gain a permanent Vampire Locust that attacks a nearby enemy every 3 seconds. The Vampire Locust deals 159.12 damage and returns to heal Anub'arak for 38.48 health.

20.name: Cryptweave
20.description: Staying near the Cocoon allows Anub'arak to extend the duration by up to 4 seconds per Cocoon.

20.name: Nullification Shield
20.description: Activate to gain 60 Spell Armor for 5 seconds.

20.name: Rewind
20.description: Activate to reset the cooldowns of your Basic Abilities.
